body: Hi, I'm dealing with some issues with plotting results in the AdaptiveChart component. At first i noticed a strange pattern where the plotted results show that the 24 daily temperatures are aligned between them (see next image): [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pn1gkRGKtSaQeot64cQGcPAAwJBmKS8ZYpoOS4oxHZ1xyJO9zVGGViX0W0dqH8KuhGWA8YaRg5WcsZfBQ2QKZAJA*JhQ*HH7/Capture1.JPG)Then i compared the plotted results at CBE website with those of this component (see image). Clearly they don't agree with each other. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pn1gkRGKtSZHH2gUbrO2ZX2ORzB60icKJqIOD7vT7atV*LdlQTaz-YDeGIeRBVn-jHfWX2RTo0ylAb1IB0z0owzzNgzNdrsm/Capture.JPG)So, is there something i'm missing or there is a real issue here? For the same component i have another question: it is not clear for me the output degreesFromTarget. Can you explain what is the target (the band or a specific value)? BTW, i used for this discussion the hydra example AdaaptiveComfortChart. Thanks, -A.
